mapper.select: select t.id,t.text,t.pid,t.href from login_zhuy t where t.pid=#{pid}
select t.id,t.text,t.pid,t.href from zenghe t where t.pid=#{pid}

select count(*) from ( select h.houseId from t_house h left join t_area a on h.houseQuYuId = a.id left join t_subway s on h.houseDiTieId = s.subwayId left join house_age hage on h.houseAgeId = hage.houseAgeId left join house_direction hdir on h.houseDirectionId = hdir.houseDirectionId left join house_floor hfl on h.houseFloorTypeId = hfl.houseFloorTypeId left join house_type hty on h.houseTypeId = hty.houseTypeId left join house_use hus on h.houseUseId = hus.houseUseId left join house_zutype hzu on h.ZuTypeid = hzu.ZuTypeid left join house_feature hfe on h.houseTeSeId = hfe.houseTeSeId left join house_man hman on h.houseManId = hman.id left join t_agent tage on h.agentId = tage.agentId where h.houseShoucang=2
) a

select h.*,a.name houseQuYuName,s.subwayName houseDiTieName,hage.ageName houseAgeName, hdir.otName houseDirectionName,hfl.floorName houseFloorTypeName, hty.houseName houseTypeName,hus.useName houseUseName,hzu.ZuTypeName houseZuTypeName, hfe.houseTeSeName TeSeName, hman.name houseManName, tage.agentName agentName from t_house h left join t_area a on h.houseQuYuId = a.id left join t_subway s on h.houseDiTieId = s.subwayId left join house_age hage on h.houseAgeId = hage.houseAgeId left join house_direction hdir on h.houseDirectionId = hdir.houseDirectionId left join house_floor hfl on h.houseFloorTypeId = hfl.houseFloorTypeId left join house_type hty on h.houseTypeId = hty.houseTypeId left join house_use hus on h.houseUseId = hus.houseUseId left join house_zutype hzu on h.ZuTypeid = hzu.ZuTypeid left join house_feature hfe on h.houseTeSeId = hfe.houseTeSeId left join house_man hman on h.houseManId = hman.id left join t_agent tage on h.agentId = tage.agentId where h.houseShoucang=2
limit #{start},#{rows}
